item.title: Unit Type Params
item.author: cameron.evan@gmail.com (Evan Cameron)
item.description: I always enjoy reading blogs about design patterns or tricks people have picked up writing Rust. This is one I’ve seen a few times but never read about. I’ve been doing class assignments from the wonderful Operating Systems cs140e. I highly recommend this class if you know Rust and would like to try writing some lower level code. The class involves building bits of an OS for the raspberry pi.
